title: 270: Katie’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 3 (A New Villain, New Favorites, & A Circle of Emotion)
itunes:title: 270: Katie’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 3 (A New Villain, New Favorites, & A Circle of Emotion)
description:
(CW: s*xual assault discussed) The Broads recap the 3rd episode of Katie’s season - and WOW - it’s a rollercoaster of emotions! First they discuss Rachel Lindsay’s “New York Magazine” article and Chris Harrison’s pay out. Then they dive into the united exit of Karl, the Nick Viall’s circle of disclosure, their thoughts on Hunter/Connor B/Thomas’ responses, Katie’s strength and vulnerability, Michael’s powerful story, kissing techniques, their love of Aaron, the Thomas confrontation, and much more!

 

RAINN:National Resources for S*xual Assault Survivors: https://www.rainn.org/national-resources-sexual-assault-survivors-and-their-loved-ones

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***ETTITUDE: get 20% off your order, plus free shipping at ETTITUDE.COM/CHATTYBRAODS and enter promo code CHATTYBROADS

***ADAM & EVE: enter offer code CHATTY at adamandeve.com and you’ll get TEN free gifts PLUS free shipping!

***MODERN FERTILITY: Get $20 off your fertility test when you go to MODERNFERTILITY.COM/CHATTY

***FUNCTION OF BEAUTY: Go to FUNCTIONOFBEAUTY.COM/BROADS to take your quiz and save 20% on your first order!

***UPSTART: Find out how Upstart can lower your monthly payments today when you go to UPSTART.COM/CHATTY

***FAB FIT FUN: use coupon code CHATTY for $10 off your first box at WWW.FABFITFUN.COM
